trailingComments.value:
*
 * @desc Returns true if hexValue is a valid hex value, otherwise returns false
 * @param {string} hexValue - a hex value
 * @return {boolean} - true or false
 *
 * @example
 * '#FBB', '#SHFF56', '#FF56'
